__e: Life is so much better when you sleep well!
“ONE CANNOT THINK WELL, LOVE WELL, SLEEP WELL, IF ONE HAS NOT DINED WELL.”
"If you don't sleep at night, it isn't the coffee, it's the bunk."
No, sir. "If you can't sleep at night, it isn't the coffee, it's the bunk."
I think I know why you don't sleep at night. And yours is a different reason than mine.
If you're a thief, then why did you go to sleep?
You can play as many games as you want to, just make sure I'm not involved.
You sleep here and me in the office.
Get some sleep, okay? You look tired.
Take your medicine and get some sleep.
Why don't you get some sleep?
Get some sleep, okay? You look tired.
Take your medicine and get some sleep.
Why don't you get some sleep?
When you have the dentist at home and sleep in a cage.
If you won't leave the house as l- - I ask you to you must sleep in this room tonight.
You're sleeping in the same room as him?
- We have a mild soporific here, if you're sleeping badly.
If you can't sleep, there must be some reason for it.
Your diet changes, your sleep is interrupted you face a major crisis every other day.
